mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS review_id, r.user_id, r.store_id, r.score, TO_CHAR(r.review) AS review, TO_CHAR(r.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS created_at, u.nickname FROM review r JOIN user_data u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (id, user_id, store_id, score, review, created_at) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{storeId}, #{score}, #{review}, #{createdAt})
